tsdst.modeling.EstimatorSelectionHelper¶

class tsdst.modeling.EstimatorSelectionHelper(models, params, searchCV, searchCVparams)[source]¶

A wrapper for easily grid-searching multiple models in the same run.

This is adapted from David Batista, so credit goes to him.

see here: https://davidsbatista.net/blog/2018/02/23/model_optimization

I added some functionality that will extend to the sklearn-deap package as well. see here: https://github.com/rsteca/sklearn-deap

Methods

__init__(models, params, searchCV, …)

Constructor for the EstimatorSelectionHelper class.

fit(X, y)

perform the search.

score_summary([sort_by])

Create a summary of the scores and results.
